me.Abhigya.core.util.math.target

Class TargetUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.math.target.TargetUtils

  • public class TargetUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for calculating targets

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  TargetUtils.TargetFilterMultiplexer
      A TargetFilter that delegates to an ordered array of other filters.
      protected static class  TargetUtils.TargetFilterSelf
      An implementation of TargetFilter to avoid a specified Player to be considered when looking for a target entity.

        public TargetUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • getTarget

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Entity getTarget(Ray ray,
                                                 org.bukkit.World world,
                                                 double range,
                                                 TargetFilter filter)
        Gets a target entity located an the provided world, from a Ray and a range, using the specified TargetFilter for filtering.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target entity will be returned.

        Parameters:
        ray - Ray
        world - World target entities resides in
        range - Range that determines how distant an entity can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        filter - Filter
        Returns:
        Target entity or null

      • getTarget

        public static <T extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity> T getTarget(Ray ray,
                                                               org.bukkit.World world,
                                                               double range,
                                                               java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Gets a target entity located an the provided world, from a Ray and a range, using a TargetFilterClass with the specified clazz for filtering entities by class.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target entity will be returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Entity class
        Parameters:
        ray - Ray
        world - World target entities resides in.
        range - Range that determines how distant an entity can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        clazz - Entity class for the TargetFilterClass filter
        Returns:
        Target entity or null
        See Also:
        TargetFilterClass, getTarget(Ray, World, double, TargetFilter)

      • getTarget

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Entity getTarget(Ray ray,
                                                 org.bukkit.World world,
                                                 double range,
                                                 org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Gets a target entity located an the provided world, from a Ray and a range, using a TargetFilterType with the specified type for filtering entities by type.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target entity will be returned.

        Parameters:
        ray - Ray
        world - World target entities resides in
        range - Range that determines how distant an entity can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        type - Entity type for the TargetFilterType filter
        Returns:
        Target entity or null
        See Also:
        TargetFilterType, getTarget(Ray, World, double, TargetFilter)

      • getTarget

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Entity getTarget(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                 double range,
                                                 TargetFilter filter)
        Gets a target entity of the desired Player located in the world of the player, within a range, using the specified TargetFilter for filtering.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target entity will be returned.

        Parameters:
        player - Player
        range - the range that determines how distant an entity can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        filter - Filter
        Returns:
        Target entity or null
        See Also:
        getTarget(Ray, World, double, TargetFilter)

      • getTarget

        public static <T extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity> T getTarget(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                               double range,
                                                               java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Gets a target entity of the desired Player located in the world of the player, within a range, using a TargetFilterClass with the specified clazz for filtering entities by class.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target entity will be returned.

        Type Parameters:
        T - Entity class
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        range - Range that determines how distant an entity can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        clazz - Entity class for the TargetFilterClass filter
        Returns:
        Target entity or null
        See Also:
        TargetFilterClass, getTarget(Ray, World, double, TargetFilter)

      • getTarget

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Entity getTarget(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                 double range,
                                                 org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Gets a target entity of the desired Player located in the world of the player, using a TargetFilterType with the specified type for filtering entities by type.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target entity will be returned.

        Parameters:
        player - Player
        range - Range that determines how distant an entity can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        type - Entity type for the TargetFilterType filter
        Returns:
        Target entity or null
        See Also:
        TargetFilterType, getTarget(Ray, World, double, TargetFilter)

      • getTargetPlayer

        public static org.bukkit.entity.Player getTargetPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                       double range)
        Gets a target player of the desired Player located in the world of the player. This uses a TargetFilterType with the EntityType.PLAYER for filtering.

        Also it is guaranteed that the closest target player will be returned.

        Parameters:
        player - Player
        range - Range that determines how distant a player can be to be considered as a target. Integer.MAX_VALUE can be used to consider all the entities residing in the world, but note that the performance might be affected because of more entities will be considered.
        Returns:
        Target player or null
        See Also:
        getTarget(Player, double, EntityType)
